title: Product Development Process Complexity Measurement and NASA-TLX-Based Workload Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Product Development Stages and Experience with VR Simulation
context.additional_context: Learners experience a real product development scenario in a VR environment and acquire methods to measure workload using the NASA-TLX tool

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more key stages and complexity factors in the product development process.
Learners can demonstrate how to measure design workload across six categories using the NASA-TLX scale.
Learners can derive process improvement points by analyzing workload data collected from VR simulations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
